public.derived_user_persona_xp.definition: select "xp_events"."user_id", "xp_events"."persona_type", CAST(SUM("xp_events"."raw_xp" * COALESCE("xp_weights"."multiplier", 1)) AS INTEGER) as "xp" from "xp_events" left join "xp_weights" on "xp_weights"."event_type" = "xp_events"."event_type" group by "xp_events"."user_id", "xp_events"."persona_type"
public.derived_user_persona_xp.name: derived_user_persona_xp

public.derived_user_xp.definition: select "xp_events"."user_id", CAST(SUM("xp_events"."raw_xp" * COALESCE("xp_weights"."multiplier", 1)) AS INTEGER) as "xp" from "xp_events" left join "xp_weights" on "xp_weights"."event_type" = "xp_events"."event_type" group by "xp_events"."user_id"
public.derived_user_xp.name: derived_user_xp
